name: A-Star Theft Demo 7
description:
Game Summary

A-Star Theft follows Logan Huntborn as he tries to protect his gang
from the dangerous organization known as The Opposition.

This demo includes the first 7 missions of the story and lets you shoot, sneak, and steal your way to victory!

Key features include:
- Fast-paced Action: Choose your weapons and get in and out as fast as possible.
- Strategic Stealth: Take control over the situation and subdue any guards and witnesses.
- Crowd Control: Control civilians and make everyone fear you.
- Mini Games: Unlock doors by either lock picking or drilling them open.
- Varied Enemies: Enemies range from security guards and police officers, to tactical teams, turrets, and rival gangs.
- Equipment Store: Purchase new weapons and armor, or spend money on a glass cutter, cable ties and a guard outfit.
